title: Getting Started with typeR
text: Welcome typeR package! vignette, ’ll learn install package, ’s designed , use core functionality. Whether ’re beginner advanced R user, guide help get started right foot. package designed simulate typing effects R scripts presentations tutorials.

title: Getting Started with typeR
text: haven’t already, can install package. soon becomes available CRAN: Install development version GitHub: installation, load package:
code: install.packages("typeR") # Install devtools package if not already installed if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) {   install.packages("devtools") }  # Install from GitHub devtools::install_github("fgazzelloni/typeR") library(typeR)

title: Getting Started with typeR
text: Let’s dive simple example show typeR works practice.

what: Example with a custom R script
title: Getting Started with typeR
text: typeR() function can simulate typing R script line line R console. ’s basic example: ’s output looks like: Check function reference documentation details available parameters usage.
code: library(typeR)  # Create a test script for demonstration writeLines(c(   "# Testing typeR",   "x <- 1:10",   "y <- x*2",   "plot(x, y)" ), "test_script.R")  # Simulate typing the script typeR("test_script.R", delay = 0.05)

title: Getting Started with typeR

title: Simulate Typing Script
text: typeR R package simulates typing effects R script files, making ideal live coding presentations, interactive teaching, creating animations.

title: Simulate Typing Script
text: install development version typeR GitHub, use:
code: # Install devtools if you don't already have it install.packages("devtools")  # Install typeR from GitHub devtools::install_github("fgazzelloni/typeR")

title: Simulate Typing Script
text: ’s example use typeR package:
code: library(typeR)  # Create a test script for demonstration writeLines(c(   "# Testing typeR",   "x <- 1:10",   "y <- x*2",   "plot(x, y)" ), "test_script.R")  # Simulate typing the script typeR("test_script.R", delay = 0.05)

title: Simulate Typing Script
text: Simulates typing R script files line line. Adjustable typing speed using delay parameter. Creates engaging live coding demonstrations.

text: Contributions welcome! Please open issue submit pull request.

text: internal function simulates typing vector strings.

title: Internal Helper: Type Out Lines — .simulate_typing
text: lines character vector script lines simulate typing. delay delay (seconds) typing character (default: 0.05).
